roleset.name: strange (may require concatenation)
roleset.note: ODD-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from odd.01-j)

example.text: In 17th century England, it was odd to find people organized for the purpose of giving aid to those in need and of pursuing projects for the benefit of all mankind.

roleset.name: of numbers, having one left over, not even
roleset.note: ODD-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from odd.02-j)

example.text: One thing we could do is sum up all of the degrees of the vertices in this graph and see if that number was odd or even.
